Customer - Class in <Unnamed>
The Customer class creates a customer with id and activity time as constructor parameters, the default status is "Arrive".

Constructs a new customer with allocated id and activityTime.

A comparison function that implemenst the Comparator interface to determine the order of Customer in a priority queue.

N

Q

QueueManager - Class in <Unnamed>
Abstraction of PriorityQueue methods for Customer Class, includes some methods from the PriorityQueue class that is required to operate on Customer objects.

The Server class creates a server with time, denoting when the server would be free to serve a customer.
